name: Lioneye's Watch
flavourText: Cold, dank and reeking of infection. That's how Hope fares in Wraeclast.

name: The Twilight Strand
flavourText: Hope was drowned here.

name: The Coast
flavourText: The cliffs echo the hungry madness.

name: The Tidal Island
flavourText: Despite the warming sun, the breeze here bites with fangs of ice.

name: The Mud Flats
flavourText: Mud and air seethes with warped life.

name: The Fetid Pool
flavourText: Sluggish waters simmering with decay.

name: The Flooded Depths
flavourText: Darkness chilled into stillness.

name: The Submerged Passage
flavourText: Slime, shadow, and sharp sharp teeth.

name: The Ledge
flavourText: Dusty winds laden with the scent of bone, old and otherwise.

name: The Climb
flavourText: The cliffs glower down like judges in session.

name: The Lower Prison
flavourText: The air is rich with despair and apparition.

name: The Upper Prison
flavourText: The air is rich with despair and apparition.

name: Prisoner's Gate
flavourText: The cliffs watch with goatish eyes.

name: The Ship Graveyard
flavourText: Whispered agonies of the marooned dead.

name: The Ship Graveyard Cave
flavourText: A corpse's throat, exhaling death.

name: The Cavern of Wrath
flavourText: The air needles the skin with its frigid fury.

name: The Cavern of Anger
flavourText: The air needles the skin with its frigid fury.

name: The Forest Encampment
flavourText: A remnant of civility in the wild.

name: The Southern Forest
flavourText: Lush and humid, sweating violence.

name: The Old Fields
flavourText: Sick pastures, feverish to the touch.

name: The Den
flavourText: Hot and sour as the panting of a rabid bear.

name: The Crossroads
flavourText: Life struggles where once it bloomed.

name: The Crypt Level 1
flavourText: Stones worn smooth by centuries of devotion.

name: The Crypt Level 2
flavourText: Stones worn smooth by centuries of devotion.

name: The Chamber of Sins Level 1
flavourText: Phantom whispers of maniacal passion.

name: The Chamber of Sins Level 2
flavourText: Phantom whispers of maniacal passion.

name: The Broken Bridge
flavourText: A pure, soothing river once red and clogged with the victims of war.

name: The Riverways
flavourText: Once tamed rivers now running free.

name: The Northern Forest
flavourText: Daylight is the exile here.

name: The Western Forest
flavourText: Bathed in the cool light of obsession.

name: The Weaver's Chambers
flavourText: Shrouded in mourning silks.

name: The Vaal Ruins
flavourText: Shades scratching at imprisoning stone.

name: The Wetlands
flavourText: Corrupted waters, pouring from the Mantle above.

name: The Dread Thicket
flavourText: Unfettered nature. Unchained ferocity.

name: The Caverns
flavourText: Two thousand years of regret.

name: The Ancient Pyramid
flavourText: Two thousand years of regret.

name: The Fellshrine Ruins
flavourText: The ground aches with desecration. The rain tastes of blight.

name: The Sarn Encampment
flavourText: The forging ground of heroes, past and present.

name: The City of Sarn
flavourText: A harsh light on harsh sights.

name: The Slums
flavourText: Only the wind whistles and whines here now.

name: The Crematorium
flavourText: Choked with ash and cinder.

name: The Marketplace
flavourText: All the money in the world can't stop a world from ending.

name: The Catacombs
flavourText: Coughing up the dust of dead devotion.

name: The Battlefront
flavourText: Charred flesh and spilled bowels. Sweet and sour.

name: The Solaris Temple Level 1
flavourText: An empire at its height, reflected in polished gold.

name: The Solaris Temple Level 2
flavourText: An empire at its height, reflected in polished gold.

name: The Docks
flavourText: Life pales in the wake of progress.

name: The Sewers
flavourText: What horrors lurk in the bowels of the city?

name: The Ebony Barracks
flavourText: Polished surfaces reflect brutal efficiency.

name: The Lunaris Temple Level 1
flavourText: Depravity is boundless.

name: The Lunaris Temple Level 2
flavourText: Depravity is boundless.

name: The Imperial Gardens
flavourText: Nature outgrows the designs of Man.

name: The Library
flavourText: All the knowledge in the Empire could not save them.

name: The Archives
flavourText: All the knowledge in the Empire could not save them.

name: The Sceptre of God
flavourText: The pinnacle of power. The height of hubris.

name: The Upper Sceptre of God
flavourText: The pinnacle of power. The height of hubris.

name: Highgate
flavourText: A frail scab of hope holds Nightmare at bay.

name: The Aqueduct
flavourText: The rushing lifeblood of a long-dead Empire.

name: The Dried Lake
flavourText: Bones of betrayal, ashes of purity.

name: The Mines Level 1
flavourText: Disease in the darkness.

name: The Mines Level 2
flavourText: Disease in the darkness.

name: The Crystal Veins
flavourText: Gifts of the Beast, awaiting plunder.

name: Kaom's Dream
flavourText: Fury and flame come to life.

name: Kaom's Stronghold
flavourText: A holdfast built of hubris.

name: Daresso's Dream
flavourText: No matter how far you climb, you never escape the Pits.

name: The Grand Arena
flavourText: Dripping blood and weeping flowers.

name: The Belly of the Beast Level 1
flavourText: Enter the Nightmare.

name: The Belly of the Beast Level 2
flavourText: Enter the Nightmare.

name: The Harvest
flavourText: Where dreams come to die.

name: The Ascent
flavourText: The greater the rise, the greater the fall.

name: Overseer's Tower
flavourText: Vengeance is the slave's ultimate reward.

name: The Slave Pens
flavourText: In Oriath's darkest corner, the spark of rebellion ignites.

name: The Control Blocks
flavourText: The illusion of control is swiftly severed by the blade of reality.

name: Oriath Square
flavourText: What was once the heart of the city is now the heart of the battle.

name: The Ruined Square
flavourText: Oriath's bleeding heart is the main course in a terrible feast.

name: The Templar Courts
flavourText: Only those with faithful eyes may enter these solemn chambers unbidden.

name: The Torched Courts
flavourText: Fuelled by blood and chaos, a dark inferno engulfs the halls of justice.

name: The Chamber of Innocence
flavourText: In this holiest of sanctums, the High Templar communes with God and delivers His divine judgement.

name: The Ossuary
flavourText: The faithful dead watch over the city with hollow eyes.

name: The Reliquary
flavourText: A trove of shameful relics displayed with pride.

name: The Cathedral Rooftop
flavourText: Atop this burning monument to arrogance, Oriath's final hope remains.

name: Lioneye's Watch
flavourText: The shivering tides bring little hope, only desperation and despair.

name: The Twilight Strand
flavourText: Those that now wash ashore seek no warmth or shelter, only to fill a bottomless void of pain and hunger.

name: The Coast
flavourText: The Ancestors return to conquer these shores once again.

name: The Tidal Island
flavourText: As the tide rises, hope is drowned.

name: The Mud Flats
flavourText: Mud and blood make a fine war paint.

name: The Karui Fortress
flavourText: The waters here, once stagnant and foul, now run clear with an ancient bloodlust.

name: The Ridge
flavourText: The air is thin, the way is narrow.

name: The Lower Prison
flavourText: Echoes of the past bring new life to an old experiment.

name: Shavronne's Tower
flavourText: Echoes of the past bring new life to an old experiment.

name: Prisoner's Gate
flavourText: The hunting grounds of a cloven god.

name: The Western Forest
flavourText: What madness flitters and creeps through the darkened trees?

name: The Riverways
flavourText: These violent waters carry portents of death.

name: The Wetlands
flavourText: A corpulent grub flails mindlessly, infesting the putrescent muck.

name: The Southern Forest
flavourText: Insidious pupa populate under sweltering heat.

name: The Cavern of Anger
flavourText: Stalactites drip in mourning for an ocean queen.

name: The Beacon
flavourText: An echo of destiny consumes the land.

name: The Brine King's Reef
flavourText: A coral throne for a salt-soured god.

name: The Bridge Encampment
flavourText: Surviving rodents cling tight to cracks found in the masonry.

name: The Broken Bridge
flavourText: The stonework trembles atop this petrified land.

name: The Crossroads
flavourText: Ancient cruelty tears through the cobbled intersection.

name: The Fellshrine Ruins
flavourText: A spirit of sadism blemishes the earth.

name: The Crypt
flavourText: Ancestral memories given life, then soured.

name: The Chamber of Sins Level 1
flavourText: Decrepit ruins born again. A lusting evil stalks its halls.

name: The Chamber of Sins Level 2
flavourText: Decrepit ruins born again. A lusting evil stalks its halls.

name: Maligaro's Sanctum
flavourText: The inner depths of decadent darkness.

name: The Den
flavourText: Sodden spores flourish and feast on decaying flesh.

name: The Ashen Fields
flavourText: Scorched earth and slumbering cinder.

name: The Northern Forest
flavourText: Wooden sentinels tower above.

name: The Dread Thicket
flavourText: Dripping with anger and grief, the ancient thicket weeps.

name: The Causeway
flavourText: Primordial ruins guard antiquarian secrets.

name: The Vaal City
flavourText: Ancient and arcane, a civilisation lost to the dust of history.

name: The Temple of Decay Level 1
flavourText: Arachnoid servants dribble and drool, coveting pilgrim flesh to feed abhorrent desires.

name: The Temple of Decay Level 2
flavourText: Arachnoid servants dribble and drool, coveting pilgrim flesh to feed abhorrent desires.

name: The Sarn Ramparts
flavourText: A parapet shakes beneath a billowing sky.

name: The Sarn Encampment
flavourText: A shaky peace descends, though swords will never rest.

name: The Toxic Conduits
flavourText: Spells of blood foul the waters below.

name: Doedre's Cesspool
flavourText: Spells of blood foul the waters below.

name: The Grand Promenade
flavourText: A favourite walk of noble lords, now fallen into disrepair.

name: The High Gardens
flavourText: Creeping dread chokes life from this thriving terrace.

name: The Bath House
flavourText: Hidden sin where revelry thrives.

name: The Lunaris Concourse
flavourText: Allegiances falter like the waning of the moon.

name: The Lunaris Temple Level 1
flavourText: Gibbous beauty eclipsed by a sisters' feud.

name: The Lunaris Temple Level 2
flavourText: Gibbous beauty eclipsed by a sisters' feud.

name: The Quay
flavourText: The restless dead shift 'neath darkened waters.

name: The Grain Gate
flavourText: A barrier trembles before undying feet.

name: The Imperial Fields
flavourText: The savagery of war stains both muck and mire.

name: The Solaris Concourse
flavourText: Conquered by the fog of war.

name: The Solaris Temple Level 1
flavourText: Luminary flares extinguished by burning pride.

name: The Solaris Temple Level 2
flavourText: Luminary flares extinguished by burning pride.

name: The Harbour Bridge
flavourText: A dark unrest sends ribbons to war.

name: The Blood Aqueduct
flavourText: A mighty spillway tainted by tarrish blacks and sanguine reds.

name: Highgate
flavourText: Survivors huddle 'neath baleful shadows of rot and decay.

name: The Descent
flavourText: A freezing drop to test one's resolve.

name: The Vastiri Desert
flavourText: Blustering sand, sharper than a bandit's blade.

name: The Oasis
flavourText: A paradise hidden amongst sunbleached bones and blistering dunes.

name: The Foothills
flavourText: The secrets of history lie hidden among layers of dirt and sand.

name: The Boiling Lake
flavourText: These corrosive waters devour both flesh and bone.

name: The Tunnel
flavourText: Unspeakable horrors filigree and haunt the nameless dark.

name: The Quarry
flavourText: A monstrous terror stalks chthonic mines, yearning for the boundless sky.

name: The Refinery
flavourText: Madness was visited upon those who dug too deep.

name: The Belly of the Beast
flavourText: Once flushed with the warmness of blood, now festering; consumed by fungal rot.

name: The Rotting Core
flavourText: The putrid interior oozes and spoils.

name: Oriath Docks
flavourText: A final refuge, backed hard against the waves of a raging sea.

name: The Cathedral Rooftop
flavourText: From above, the true scope of carnage is clearly espied.

name: The Ravaged Square
flavourText: A flourishing place of trade, barely recognizable amidst the countless deaths.

name: The Torched Courts
flavourText: Pious priests once dealt cruel justice within these halls, now they both smoulder in silent agony.

name: The Desecrated Chambers
flavourText: Mad men toil under smoking skies to pervert a holy sanctum.

name: The Canals
flavourText: A man-made rupture from which both blood and water flow.

name: The Feeding Trough
flavourText: Cries of torment and pathetic moans as the unholy banquet of flesh continues.

name: The Control Blocks
flavourText: Sadists and cut-throats break both bone and brain.

name: The Reliquary
flavourText: Empty, broken shelves linger, looted and forgotten in the wake of this horrid war.

name: The Ossuary
flavourText: The dead offer thanks, for they have been spared this final savagery.
